title: Tagged thresholds are false negative
body:
Expected all tagged thresholds (below) to be tainted, but they weren't.

Script: 
```
import http from "k6/http";
import { sleep } from "k6";

export let options = {
  stages: [
      { duration: "60s", target: 10 },
  ],
  thresholds: {
    "http_req_duration{system:main}": ["p(95)<50"],
    "http_req_duration{url:http://test.loadimpact.com}": ["p(95)<50"]
  }
};

export default function() {
  http.get("http://test.loadimpact.com", { tags: { system: "main" } });
  sleep(1);
};
```
Results:
```
k6 run -o cloud aws-elb/threshold_error.js 

          /\      |‾‾|  /‾‾/  /‾/   
     /\  /  \     |  |_/  /  / /   
    /  \/    \    |      |  /  ‾‾\  
   /          \   |  |‾\  \ | (_) | 
  / __________ \  |__|  \__\ \___/ .io

  execution: local
     output: cloud (https://app.loadimpact.com/k6/runs/2387)
     script: aws-elb/threshold_error.js

    duration: -,  iterations: -
         vus: 1, max: 10

    done [==========================================================] 1m0s / 1m0s

    data_received..............: 375 kB 6.3 kB/s
    data_sent..................: 25 kB  421 B/s
    http_req_blocked...........: avg=1.5ms    min=5µs     med=10µs    max=49.49ms p(90)=16µs    p(95)=19.69µs
    http_req_connecting........: avg=1.49ms   min=0s      med=0s      max=49.38ms p(90)=0s      p(95)=0s     
    http_req_duration..........: avg=49.94ms  min=47.34ms med=48.2ms  max=78.64ms p(90)=52.88ms p(95)=56.1ms 
    http_req_receiving.........: avg=118.58µs min=43µs    med=115µs   max=284µs   p(90)=164.2µs p(95)=185µs  
    http_req_sending...........: avg=37.82µs  min=14µs    med=33µs    max=190µs   p(90)=51µs    p(95)=57.09µs
    http_req_tls_handshaking...: avg=0s       min=0s      med=0s      max=0s      p(90)=0s      p(95)=0s     
    http_req_waiting...........: avg=49.78ms  min=47.24ms med=48.04ms max=78.52ms p(90)=52.74ms p(95)=55.98ms
    http_reqs..................: 287    4.783315/s
    iteration_duration.........: avg=1.05s    min=1.04s   med=1.04s   max=1.1s    p(90)=1.05s   p(95)=1.06s
```
